page.title: 19MANOR FARM
page.content: {Manor Farm}was situated at {Medlicott,}a small settlement about one and a half miles from {Ratlinghope. Manor Farm was built in the 12th century by two Medlicott brothers.The two brothers and their ancestors are buried in nearby{Wentnor Church. The Manor house was knocked down in 1969 (16 years ago) and another farm built on top, parts of the original wall still exists. Copper mines ran underneath the house at one time but they were closed in the 1880's A descendant of the Medlicotts still lives in the nearby cottage,and has a shop in{Shrewsbury.}People from all over the world visit Medlicott to see the place where their ancestors were born.
